DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : To assess efficacy stent ( sinus-Obliquus stent common iliac vein , sinus-XL Flex stent sinus-Venous stent external iliac common femoral vein ) evaluate different gradation patency rate , patient 's rating disease severity quality life patient post-thrombotic syndrome concomitant common iliac vein compression . Secondary objective : To assess long-term safety venous stenting
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Postthrombotic Syndrome With Oblique Stent - TOPOS Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female adult age â‰¥18 year 2 . Postthrombotic syndrome ( Villalta score > 4 point ) due iliac vein thrombosis without femoral deep vein thrombosis 3 . Evidence venous stenosis common iliac vein > 50 % confirm venography ( CT MRI ) intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) 4 . Use sinusObliquus stent unilateral common iliac vein stenosis 5 . If stent extension require either sinusXL Flex sinusVenous stent must use stenosis > 50 % confirm venography ( CT MRI ) IVUS external iliac common femoral vein 1 . Pregnancy , breastfeed birthgiving last 30 day 2 . Life expectancy < 6 month 3 . Iliofemoral DVT le 3 month ago 4 . Permanently immobile patient ( wheelchair user bedridden patient ) 5 . Allergy Nitinol 6 . Patient 's target vessel ( ) has/have stented 7 . Legal incapacity and/or circumstance render patient unable understand nature , scope possible impact study 8 . Patients custody juridical official order
